title: Chopard Happy Sport with Diamond Ladies Watch
description: Chopard Happy Sport stainless steel quartz ladies watch. White dial with 5 floating Diamonds, case diameter: 26mm, wrist size: 17cm, Swiss made. Ref# 27/8250-23. With Chopard stainless steel bracelet and clasp. With Certificate of Authenticity, undated Chopard Certificate of Origin and Chopard box. 3 month FSA warranty. Weight: 62.3g (Pre-owned)
